|brand = ASUS |model = WMP-N12 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = audio streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-WMPR300 |icid = 3568A-WMPR300 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Audio in/out (3.5mm, RCA, optical) |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_WMPN12 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/12/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = 50 |upc = 886227881161 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ASUS WMP-N12 FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-WMPR300 MSQ-WMPR300] :[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2776363 Users manual] Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2776361 FCC label]
===Features=== * Extends wireless home networking * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app or AirPlay * One-press setup and worry-free connectivity * Full coverage with internal MIMO antennas
===Specifications=== *Name: ASUS WMP-N12 Wireless Audio Streamer *Product Name: ASUS SonicStream *Category: Media Bridge; MP Date: *Product Segment: 802.11b/g/n 2T2R :N300: 300Mbps (2.4GHz, 20/40MHz) *Chipset/WiFi: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N :Data Rate: 802.11n (up to 300Mbps) :Wireless encryption: Open System/WPA/WPA2 *Memory: Flash: 8MB, RAM: 16MB *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antennas *Ports: 1x FE LAN (RJ45) 10/100 BaseT :2x Audio (3.5mm), 2x RCA, 1x Optical *Audio Processor: C-Media 6510B *Audio Input: WiFi / AUX In *Audio Output: 3.5mm Phone jack/Stereo RCA/Optical (SPDI/F) *Operational Amplifier: TI Burr-Brown OPA-1602 *Stereo DAC Sample Rates: 8K/11.025K/16K/22.05K/32K/44.1K/ :48K/88.2K/96K (Bit rate: 16/24bits) *SPDI/F Sample Rates: 44.1K/48K/88.2K/96K (Bit rate: 16/24bits) *Audio Signal to noise ratio: up to 100 dB :Frequency response: 10Hz to 48KHz :Headphone impedance: 32 ohm :THD + N: up to 0.002% @1KHz *Support format: .mp3 .wav .flac *Software Application: ASUS AiPlayer (iOS / Android) *Button: Volume switch / Reset *LED: System LED / Volume LED *Power Supply: USB adapter (input 5V/1A) :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) 0.2A :DC Output : 5V with max 1A current *Size: 110x75x22 mm
==See also== * [[ASUS RP-N12]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN12/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product Page]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
